divs: Sighting Details1 I was in my car ... driving ... just off HWY 5 South-bound EXIT 19 toAshland, Oregon2 At the red light ... intersection of HIGHWAY 99 and VALLEY VIEW RD. Saw 2people male female 40-somethings between buildings of MR. Cs and next doorMEXICAN RESTAURANT looking up in the sky in that Close Encounters of the ThirdKind wonderment and awe. The light turned green, I began very slow left turn --because I wanted to see what the people mentioned above were in awe about ... itwas then at mid-turning I saw this large, blackish brown triangular craft aboveEXIT 19 with the TEXACO STATION in foreground for scale close to Exit 19.3 I thought -- Hmmm. That is not a regular aircraft. Oh, my -- THAT is a UFO...4 I had slowed to a near stop in the middle of the left turn -- a car came upbehind me from the same direction, I had to complete the turn, I countiuedlooking at it and turning to the front to navigate to the immediate side of theroad. I was calm -- I had a sense of wonderment as to what I had seen. When Ilooked back -- it was gone.5 Object was a large, blackish brown triangular craft -- no bigger that 100feet in diameter. It hovered. I have a recreation I made in Bryce and map ofscene back in October of 2000 if required.6 I had pulled over to the immediate curb when the car behind me came up. Bythe time I looked to the sky and the location it was seen -- it was gone.
